channel.title: User var can be called even I deleted them
channel.description:
so I make a user variable, let's say it's id1 = "test" I tested it with make it a text in my app, I called it and it worked. I then deleted the id1 user variable in the KeyAuth website and restart my app, but the text is still in there
``` label2.Text = LoginSc.KeyAuthApp.getvar("id1"); ```
I tried to relog the KeyAuth website just in case and check whether it actually gets deleted or not, and yes it's got deleted, there is nothing in user variables, but it's still the same, the label2.Text still has the user variable data that I've already deleted
is this a bug from KeyAuth or is this my fault?

item.title: User var can be called even I deleted them
item.dc:creator: mak
item.source: User var can be called even I deleted them

item.title: User var can be called even I deleted them
item.dc:creator: mak
item.description:
Yes this is a bug. Fixed, thanks for making us aware.

Read full topic
item.source: User var can be called even I deleted them

item.title: User var can be called even I deleted them
item.dc:creator: akikazu12
item.description:
fixed
I guess it’s kind of bug, I deleted the user, make a new one with different username, and it works fine

Read full topic
